newsitem.title: MEXICO: Philippines president Ramos arrives in Mexico City.
newsitem.headline: Philippines president Ramos arrives in Mexico City.

text.p: Philippines President Fidel Ramos arrived in the Mexican capital on Sunday for meetings with President Ernesto Zedillo, following two days of informal visits to Mexico's Pacific and Gulf coasts.
Ramos, who said his trip was to strengthen economic ties between the two developing nations, was scheduled to meet Zedillo on Monday. Zedillo visited the Philippines last November.

Ramos arrived in Mexico on Friday at the Pacific resort of Acapulco with a delegation of some 60 businessmen. On Sunday, he flew to the port of Veracruz, on the other side of Mexico, and inaugurated a container terminal.
He was due to leave Mexico for Panama on Tuesday, Zedillo's office said in a statement.
